result.title: Nordson Corporation Reports Record Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2025 Results
result.text: WESTLAKE, Ohio--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Nordson Corporation (Nasdaq: NDSN) today reported results for the fiscal fourth quarter ended October 31, 2025. Sales were $752 million, a 1% increase compared to the prior year's fourth quarter sales of $744 million. The increase in fourth quarter 2025 sales included favorable currency translation of 2% and a 1% acquisition impact, which was partially offset by the medical contract manufacturing divestiture and an organic sales decrease of 1%.
